text: Countess Dracula is a 1971 Hammer horror movie. It is based on Countess Elisabeth Bathory-Nadasdy and her alleged crimes in late 16th and early 17th century Hungary. In it she kills young women to look young again by bathing in their blood. Countess Nadasdy is played by Ingrid Pitt in the movie. Other characters include her lover and henchman Captain Dobi, Captain Imre Toth a soldier for her late husband who she tries to seduce by pretending to be her daughter, and Fabio, her court historian who begins to suspect her and Dobi. Pitt became a kind of cult icon for her role in this movie. ==References== ==Other websites== * Category:1971 horror movies Category:1970s serial killer movies Category:Biographical movies Category:British horror movies Category:English-language movies Category:Hungarian movies Category:Movies about abduction Category:Movies about dysfunctional families Category:Movies set in Europe
title: Countess Dracula
